CMU-SIAM
Calendar People Working group

SIAM is the Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics. The purpose of SIAM is to build cooperation between mathematics and the worlds of science and technology through our publications, research, and community.
Our SIAM student chapter at CMU allows students from all areas to be involved in this professional organization.

Address

Department of Mathematical Sciences
Carnegie Mellon University
Pittsburgh, PA 15213

Email: siamsc.cmu@gmail.com
